name: ASolver>let's solve the puzzle
description:
The system uses the camera to recognize and solve puzzles:
- 3x3x3 Magic Cube
- Magic Cube 3x3x3 Patterns
- 2x2x2 Pocket Cube
- 4x4x4 Master Cube (Revenge)
- 5x5x5 Professor's Cube
- 6x6x6 V-Cube6
- Megaminx
- Skewb
- Pyraminx
- 2x2x3 Tower
- 2x3x3 Domino
new puzzles on the way.

For 2x2x2, 2x2x3, 2x3x3, Skewb and Pyraminx, it finds a solution with a minimal number of moves.

The solution for the Magic Cube 3x3x3 is very close to optimal.

4x4x4 on average is solved in 50 moves.
5x5x5 in 85 moves.
6x6x6 in 140 moves.
Megaminx in 130 moves.

You can use free puzzles solutions that are given at regular intervals, take advantage of in-app purchases or subscriptions. Terms of Use are available at https://bnice.ru/asolver/terms.html
